yacl.easyrename.title: Easy Rename
yacl.easyrename.syncItemFrame.label: Rename Item Frame
yacl.easyrename.syncItemFrame.descriptio:
Whether to rename nearby item frames when renaming a container.

Useful when used with the Item Frame Name functionality of the InventoryTabs mod.
yacl.easyrename.useXP.label: Use XP
yacl.easyrename.useXP.description: Whether to use XP when renaming a container.
yacl.easyrename.useLevels.label: Use Levels
yacl.easyrename.useLevels.description: Enable to use your XP levels, otherwise disable to use your XP points for renaming a container!
yacl.easyrename.xpCost.label: Cost
yacl.easyrename.xpCost.description:
How many XP Points / XP Levels to use when renaming a container.

XP points scale with your level, so 50 points is ~4 levels when your level is 0 and ~2 levels when your level is 10.
